entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
